Catalyst uses **Keys and Keycards** for finding stashes.
- A total of **3 Keys and 4 Safe Keycards.**
- Each will guide you to a Hidden Stash or Safe to obtain loot.
- Each item will have a different Item Description.

There are a total of `3 Keys` that will open `Hidden Stashes`, `Hidden Military Crates` and `Cash Registers` - be sure to carefully read the `Item Description`. The `Item Title` and `Description` will tell you where the Stashes `general location` is, then you will have to venture out and find it.

Catalyst has `4 Safe Keycards`, each one has a `different color` and item `Title/Description`. The Keycards will open `Safes` located on every `Oilrig`, just be sure you know which Oilrig to venture to once you read the Items Description *__(Some Oilrigs require a helicopter for access, please refer to our Oilrig guide to learn more).__*
